name: chumbo.zone
description:
chumbo.zone(put this in bold please) is a visualization of raw artistic expression, extracted from the lowest depths of my soul. be warned, this is no mere "game", -- chumbo.zone is much more. "experience" is a more fitting title for this work of art.

 inspired by only the greatest minds of the last century -- david lynch, brakhage, sam france, hideo kojima, and bladee -- chumbo.zone is an on-screen interactive journey where You will laugh, You will cry, you need this shit. primal fear: in awe of your sheer dependency on this slime. You loved "Holy Smokes" (coming soon), you ate up "Inferna", and who could forget "Dwayne Crashers?"? Certainly not me.

drag yourself along this three-course fine dining EXPERIENCE(!) while you have the opportunity. admit it, a game  such as this comes once every three, maybe four millennia . LUDO such as this is rare. you wont just like it. you will love it. and if you dont love it you just dont get it.

Video Games will never be the same again. fuck you

From Muse: Break all the crates and kill all the enemies for the True Ending! This game was a little slow at the start up, but once you really get into what the game dubs the “Chumbo Zone” your mind will be blown. Forget everything you know about indie games, this one will defy all expectations and surprise you with twist after twist. I’m left hungry for more content, and the developers will have my full backing and support in the foreseeable future! From Reggoe Bananaguard: this game is basically horrible, the controls are sloppy, the graphics are nothing to write home about, the music is ass and the main character is unlikeable... But if you don't play this awesome game, eat shit NERD. You spend all day playing destiny 2 anyhow? why dont you play a game that will matter for your future? Why are you making it so complicated? It's easy... From PurpleLizard23: CHUMBO.ZONE' what the FFAAAAAAACK hahaha this game is crazy, look it up its insane , and. Basically the Gamepay is F@cking awesome bananas and the gaphics even cazier (look it up if you don't know what that is) I found this game and it's so fucking awesome.. It's probably like having s*x plowing h*t B*****s with g***t B****ies and *ch*n*s and B**ty's. Basicallt, the game is super cool and you fight robots and sombies with your Fat Fucking Gun violence and the first thing you find out is it's fucking awesome basically look it up. This Video Game Rules, Rocks Rock in Roll Old Fashion First Person Shitter classicVideo mantage awesome Sexy Moments sleek graphics user interface, large bosom 2 If u don't like this gane you a NERD, look it up if you haven't hard of it

(none of these reviews were written by people who played the game)
